â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

Kate: "Good morning everyone. Charlie's death is a real blow - losing our Doctor on Night 1 puts
us at a serious disadvantage. The mafia clearly targeted someone they saw as a threat, or 
possibly made a lucky guess. I think we need to carefully analyze who might have seemed

any particular interactions with Charlie that stood out? We can't afford to waste this lynch 
vote."

Bob: "I agree with Kate, losing Charlie is a setback. We need to think about who might have had 
a reason to target him. From what I recall, Charlie was trying to gather information subtly, 
which might have made him a threat if he was close to uncovering a mafia member. I'd be 
interested to hear if anyone noticed any specific interactions with Charlie that seemed off. We 
should also be wary of anyone who isn't contributing much to the discussion or is too eager to 
push suspicion onto others. Let's focus on gathering as much information as possible to make an 
informed decision today."

Nick: "Charlie's death is definitely concerning. I noticed he was asking some probing questions 
yesterday, which might have made him a target. Looking back, I think we should pay attention to 
who was deflecting his questions or seemed uncomfortable when he was trying to gather 
information. The mafia probably saw him as getting too close to something. I'm also wondering if
anyone has any insights about voting patterns from yesterday - sometimes mafia members try to 
blend in by following the crowd rather than taking strong stances. We need to be systematic 
about this."

Ivy: "I agree with everyone's concern about losing Charlie. It's definitely a tough loss for us.
From what I remember, he was indeed asking some key questions, but it's hard to pinpoint who 
might have felt threatened by him. I think it's important to consider both who seemed 
uncomfortable with his questions and who might have been trying to steer the conversation away 
from important points. Additionally, we should all be mindful of those who might be staying too 
quiet during these discussions. The mafia might be trying to stay under the radar to avoid 
suspicion. Let's keep sharing observations and try to piece together the puzzle."

Diana: "It's a tough start losing Charlie, our Doctor, on Night 1. It suggests the Mafia are 
organized and effective. I agree with what's been said about Charlie asking probing questions 
yesterday, which likely made him a target. We should all be thinking about who might have been 
uncomfortable with those questions, or who might have tried to subtly steer the conversation 
away from him. I also think we need to carefully watch for anyone who remains too quiet, as well
as those who are too eager to point fingers without solid reasoning."

Leo: "Charlie's death definitely hurts our chances. What strikes me is that the mafia made a 
very strategic choice - targeting someone who was asking good questions rather than going for an
obvious power role reveal. This suggests they're experienced players who recognized a threat. 
I've been thinking about yesterday's interactions, and I noticed that when Charlie was probing, 
some people gave very detailed responses while others deflected or gave short answers. We should
look at who seemed to want to move conversations away from analytical discussion. Also, I'm 
concerned that the mafia might try to use our grief over losing Charlie to rush us into a hasty 
lynch today. We need to stay methodical despite the pressure."

Frank: "I agree with the general concern about Charlie's death and how it might indicate the 
mafia saw him as a threat due to his probing questions. We should definitely look back at who 
seemed uncomfortable with his line of questioning. Additionally, let's pay attention to those 
who are participating less in discussions, as keeping a low profile is a common mafia strategy. 
At the same time, we should be cautious of those who might push us towards quick decisions 
without solid evidence. Let's gather as much information as we can and proceed carefully."

Kate: "Charlie's death really does hurt - losing our Doctor on Night 1 is a major blow. I've 
been thinking about what everyone's said, and I agree the mafia likely targeted him because of 
his analytical approach yesterday. What concerns me is that we're all focusing on who seemed 
uncomfortable with Charlie's questions, but we should also consider who might be subtly guiding 
this very discussion right now. The mafia knows we'll analyze Charlie's death, so they might be 
steering our conclusions. I want to hear more specific observations - not just general theories 
about staying quiet or deflecting. Who exactly did what yesterday that made you suspicious? 
Let's get concrete details on the table rather than speaking in generalities."

Bob: "I agree with everyone that Charlie's death is a significant loss for us. It's clear the 
mafia targeted him for his probing questions. Yesterday, I noticed that both Nick and Ivy seemed
a bit evasive when Charlie was pressing them with questions. They didn't provide detailed 
responses and seemed eager to move the conversation along. This might be nothing, but it's worth
considering. Additionally, I feel like Diana has been quite vocal, which makes me wonder if 
she's genuinely trying to help or perhaps trying to guide our suspicions. I'm interested in 
hearing more specific observations from everyone. Let's try to piece together any

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚

Diana: "It's a tough start losing Charlie, our doctor, on Night 1. It definitely points to the 
Mafia being strategic in silencing a valuable role. Bob, while I appreciate you bringing up 
specific observations about Nick and Ivy, I agree with Nick that we need to be careful not to 
misinterpret 'being strategic' as 'being evasive.' My concern right now is that we're still 
quite early in the discussion and jumping to accusations too quickly might play right into the 
Mafia's hands. I think Kate's point about analyzing who might be subtly guiding the discussion 
is important. Let's really scrutinize everyone's contributions and not just focus on who was 
quiet or who spoke a lot. The Mafia could easily be doing either to blend in. We need more 
concrete reasons to suspect someone than just their level of participation or how they answered 
a question. What inconsistencies have people noticed in anyone's statements today or yesterday?"

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

Bob (defendant): "I am innocent! I am the Detective, and here is why you should not execute me:

eliminate a key role. Please reconsider your vote, and let's focus on the actual Mafia members.

stands to gain from my elimination. Let's work together to find the real threats."

Kate: "I think Bob is suspicious because claiming Detective right when on trial feels like a 
desperate move. If he really was Detective, revealing that role puts a huge target on his back 
for the Mafia tonight. A real Detective would probably try to stay hidden longer and share 
information more subtly. Also, his claim that Nick is Mafia is convenient timing - it deflects 
attention away from himself. I'm concerned this is a Mafia member trying to save himself by 
sacrificing a Town member."

Nick: "I think Bob is suspicious because his Detective claim feels like a desperate last-ditch 
effort to avoid elimination. If he was really the Detective, why didn't he share this crucial 
information during our discussions instead of waiting until he's on trial? A real Detective

target on themselves. Plus, his accusation against me conveniently deflects all attention away 
from himself - classic Mafia move to throw suspicion on someone else when cornered. The timing 
is just too convenient."

Ivy: "I think Bob is suspicious because his claim to be the Detective seems opportunistic. If he
were genuinely the Detective, he would have been more strategic about revealing his role and 
provided more evidence or leads during discussions. Waiting until he's on trial to make this 
claim feels like an attempt to protect himself rather than the Town. Also, the way he 
immediately accuses Nick when under pressure is a classic deflection tactic often used by Mafia 
members to shift blame and cause confusion. We need to be careful about taking such claims at 
face value without additional proof."

Leo: "I think Bob is suspicious because his Detective claim feels like a desperate move to save 
himself. If he really had investigated Nick and found him to be Mafia, a true Detective would 
have shared this information during discussion to help the Town, not wait until he's on trial. 
The timing is too convenient - it looks like he's throwing Nick under the bus to deflect from 
himself. Also, revealing Detective role at this moment makes him a guaranteed Mafia target 
tonight if he's telling the truth, which seems like poor strategy for a real Detective. His 
behavior feels more like a cornered Mafia member making a last-ditch effort to survive."

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

Diana: GUILTY - Bob's claim of being the Detective comes too conveniently when he is on trial 
and facing execution. If he truly had investigated Nick and found him to be Mafia, a real 
Detective would have shared this information during the discussion phase to aid the Town in 
identifying a threat, rather than waiting until he was cornered. His sudden accusation against 
Nick appears to be a desperate attempt to deflect suspicion from himself and save his own skin, 
which is a classic Mafia tactic.

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚

â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚

â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚

calculated."

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚

â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚

Nick: "Leo, I understand why you're bringing up Bob's accusation, but we need to think 
critically about what actually happened. Bob claimed Detective and accused me, yes, but look at 
the timing and context. He made that accusation when he was under pressure and about to be voted
out. It's a classic desperate move - throw out an accusation to try to save yourself. If Bob was
really the Detective and had investigated me as Mafia, why didn't he lead with that information 
earlier? Why wait until he was on trial? A real Detective with that kind of crucial information 
would have been more strategic about revealing it. The fact that he happened to be Detective 
doesn't automatically make his last-minute accusation true. We're letting WIFOM (Wine In Front 
Of Me) thinking cloud our judgment here. I've been consistently scumhunting and contributing to 
town discussion. Leo, your sudden activity now feels reactive rather than genuine town concern."

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

Nick (defendant): "I am innocent! I'm a Villager, and this accusation is based on a desperate 
lie from Bob when he was under pressure. Think about it - Bob claimed to be Detective only AFTER
we nominated him, when he was about to be executed. That's classic Mafia behavior - making up a 
power role claim to save themselves! We executed Bob because his behavior was suspicious, not 
because we believed his last-minute Detective claim. Leo, you're pushing this hard, but ask 
yourself - why would Bob wait until he was on trial to reveal such crucial information? Real 
Detectives share intel to help Town, they don't hide it until they're about to die. I've been 
consistently voting to eliminate suspicious players and helping Town find Mafia. Don't let a 
dead Mafia member's lie from beyond the grave trick you into executing an innocent Villager!"

Diana: "I think Nick is suspicious because while he's trying to discredit Bob's claim by saying 
it was a last-minute attempt to save himself, Bob was the Detective. A Detective's word, even if
revealed under pressure, carries weight. Nick's strong insistence that Bob was lying, and his 
focus on tearing down Bob's credibility, feels like a defensive tactic from someone who was 
accurately accused. It's easy for Mafia to dismiss a dead Detective's accusation as 'desperate 
lies', but it's much harder for Town to ignore it, especially when our numbers are so low."

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚

Frank: "I think Nick is suspicious because Bob was indeed our Detective, and his accusation 
against Nick carries significant weight. Nick's attempt to undermine Bob's credibility by 
emphasizing the timing of his claim instead of addressing the accusation itself seems like a 
diversion tactic. It's crucial to remember that Bob's role was confirmed after his execution, 
and dismissing his investigation as a 'desperate lie' feels more like an effort to sow doubt 
among us rather than a genuine defense. With our current numbers, we can't afford to ignore the 
findings of our late Detective. This makes Nick more likely to be Mafia in my eyes, and I 
believe we should act on the information Bob provided to protect the Town."

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚

â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚

â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚

â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚

â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
